title: DevOps Engineering (f/m/x)
body:
IVM spezialisiert sich seit 40 Jahren auf die Ziele ihrer Projektpartner*innen und ihrer Kunden im technischen Umfeld. Mit Hilfe unserer technisch affinen WissenstrÃ¤ger*innen schaffen wir jeden Wunsch zu erfÃ¼llen. Werden Sie Consultant bei IVM und arbeiten Sie an spannenden Projekten bei den Top Unternehmen Ã–sterreichs!

Job-Nr.: 12231.44
Einsatzort: Wien
Fachbereich: Software & IT Solutions
Art der Anstellung: Full time
Gehalt (Brutto/Monat): at least € 2.300

Time for a new challenge!

  • Development and optimization of railway product infrastructures in public and on-premises cloud environments with strong focus on security requirements
  • Support development teams in cloud native application developments
  • Support development teams in build, test, release and deployment automation (CI/CD)
  • Support operational teams in reliability site engineering issues
  • Working in a world-wide international team and in cooperation with other units
  • Collaboration in a distributed agile team

Skills are the key!

  • Technical Degree in Informatics, Computer Science, Software Engineering or similar
  • At least 2 years of relevant experience and technical know-how
  • Cloud and virtualization technologies (KVM, OpenStack, Kubernetes, AWS EC2 or similar) knowledge
  • Scripting of automation processes around CI/CD (Python, Bash, Ruby, …) knowledge
  • Linux experience and container technologies
  • Experience working in an international context (multi unit/multi site) is an advantage
  • Experience in agile methodology is an advantage
  • Fluency in English and a good level of German
  • Innovative, adaptable and customer-oriented team player

These are the benefits!

  • Long-term career planning
  • Great accessibility by public transport (U6) and various benefits like flexible working time with home office policy, on-site canteen with company subsidy and Wiener Linien Yearly Ticket
  • Long-term career planning
  • Interesting and challenging job in an internationally successful company
  • Competent team
  • Motivating working atmosphere
  • Monthly gross salary: at least € 2.300 (depending on qualifications and experience)

Kontakt

Accept the challenge and let’s shape the future together!

For further information about the job, please contact
Ing. Thomas Hartinger.
IVM Technical Consultants Wien Ges.m.b.H.
Schönbrunner Allee 1-5
2331 Wien Vösendorf
